newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia Cen. Bank sells 195.3 bln rbls bills, bonds.
newsitem.headline: Russia Cen. Bank sells 195.3 bln rbls bills, bonds.

text.p: The Central Bank sold 195.00 billion roubles nominal of GKO discount Treasury bills, OFZ interest-bearing government bonds on behalf of the Finance Ministry on Tuesday, and also sold a small amount of VSM railway bonds, the bank's open-market operations department said.
The bank made the following transactions:

The bank did not say at what price the paper was sold. The 22VSM03305 issue closed on Tuesday at 98.83 percent, the 23005 issue closed at 84.48 percent, the 24011 issue closed at 102.31 percent, the 24012 issue closed at 101.23 percent and the 24013 issue closed at 10024 percent.

Apart from intervening on its own account for liquidity-smoothing and monetary policy purposes, the Central Bank buys and sells securities as part of its management of the Finance Ministry's debt and asset portfolio.
